page.title: 09Alderney Airport II
page.content: Four Air Traffic Controllers organise the flights.A.A.S has right of way except for ambulance charters.10 days of flying are lost a year because of fog or low cloud.The height ofthe runway is 291ft and the length of the runway is 2887ft. 1985 is the 50th anniversary of the foundation of the airport.It was the first commercial airport in the Channel Isles(Before this planes used to land on the beach).To commemorate this an air rally was held in the summer and was very successful being attended by about 100 private aircraft. The airport is used by other commercial airlines,private pilots ,the services and charter flights.It is a vital lifeline for the island even though it is expensive to run.
